+def abs_path(path):
+  root = os.path.dirname(__file__)
+
+  for _ in range(3):
+    root = os.path.join(root, os.pardir)
+
+  path = os.path.join(root, path)
+  path = os.path.abspath(path)
+  return path
+

+
